column4: can someone help me with nautilus?  when i try to burn a cd, it just keeps asking to insert a disc
I'm not copying a cd... i'm writing an iso to disc
where are you stuck? I mean cant you mount? Read? Copy? Explain your problem better
I right click on the iso and say write to disc... the dialog comes up I click the button for burn... it says "Insert a blank cd into the drive"
there is a blank cd already there
it's set up to mount in my fstab, I have no problem reading or playing cd's... and I have no problem burning from the command line with cdrecord
I just read what you wirteen again sorry you need to mount the iso I THINK
that's not it... because I get the same response no matter what I try to burn from nautilus... It always tells me to insert a blank disc
so I dont know how to help you :(
